resources.string: O loo i ai ni faamatalaga %d e lei sefeina. E mafai ona e tuufaatasia i au faamatalaga pe faaleaogaina.

string.name: female
string.comment: Option for using a female voice for audio playback

resources.string: Saili e ala i le igoa
Saili le fasifuaitau sao atoa “%1$s” i le %2$s
Fatu se Api Talaaga mo Faamatalaga

E ui ua aveese le vaega o talaaga, ae o loo faasaoina au faamatalaga. Afai e te manao ai, e mafai ona tatou aoina mai faamatalaga uma sa i ai talu ai nei i le vaega o talaaga ma tuu i totonu o le api o faamatalaga fou ua faaigoaina o le api o talaaga.
Toefuata\'i le api talaaga ua maea. Ua aveesea faamatalaga %d.
E faaaoga le Faitotoa a le AAG e sefe ma tuufaatasia ai au faamatalaga i masini ma le LDS.org.

string.name: link_to
string.comment: subtitle for link to Activity... continues sentence for select_text_to_link

string.name: male
string.comment: Option for using a male voice for audio playback

string.name: mark
string.comment: Select highlight color

resources.string: O le a tuufaatasia ia api o faamatalaga ua filifilia. Faamolemole ta i totonu se igoa mo le api o faamatalaga.
Ua Tuufaatasia Igoa o le Api o Faamatalaga
Ua Tuufaatasia Igoa o le Faailoga
Mei i le Api o Faamatalaga

string.name: network_required
string.comment: Not connected to any network

resources.string: O lenei faatinoga e manaomia ai se fesootaiga faainitoneti. Faamolemole fesootai i se upegatafailagi feaveai po o le Wi-Fi ma toe taumafai mai.

string.name: network_wifi_required
string.comment: Not connect to a wireless network

resources.string: E tusa ai ma ou faatulagaga, e tatau ona e fesootai i le Wi-Fi e faatino ai lenei faatinoga.
Faaopoopo le faailogatusi ia vave ai ona e toe foi i le mea sa e i ai.
Faaopoopo ia aitema i faaputuga e faigofie ai ona faaaoga.
Fatu ni faaputuga masani ina ia faigofie ai ona faaaoga aitema e fesootai i ai.
Leai ni Mea na Sii Mai o loo Faagasolo
O loo sii mai i le taimi nei ia anotusi ma ala o faasalalauga
Leai ni Ala o Faasalalauga o Sii Mai
Sii mai le otio po o le vitio mo le faaaogaina e aunoa ma le initoneti
Saili i le anotusi, sue lou auala, ma toe foi i ai.

string.name: no_matches
string.comment: No results

resources.string: Leai ni taunuuga mo le sailiga faapitoa

string.name: no_notebooks
string.comment: The message to show when there are no notebooks

resources.string: Fatu ni api o faamatalaga e ao mai ma faatulaga au faamatalaga mo lauga, lesona, ma suesuega a le tagata lava ia.
Leai ni Faamatalaga i lenei Api o Faamatalaga
Faamaumau ia faamatalaga e teuina ai ou manatu ma uunaiga.
Leai se Anotusi e Fesootai I Ai
Leai ni vaefaamatalaga po o nisi anotusi e fesootai i ai o loo maua

string.name: no_tags
string.comment: The message to show when there are no tags

resources.string: Fatu se faailoga e tuuvaega ai anotusi mai soo se mea i le polokalama.

string.name: no_tagged_content
string.comment: The message to show when there are no tags

resources.string: Faapipii se faailoga i soo se vaega o le anotusi e faasino i ai i le lumanai.
O motugaafa e faaali atu ia te outou le aoga o le faatinoga o le polokalama

resources.string: "ae faauta ou te fai atu ia te oe, o mea laiti ma faatauvaa e faataunuu ai mea tetele; ma o auala laiti i le tele o taimi, e faamaasiasia ai e popoto..."
